text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to include a contractual clause capping the French company's liability to the IOR at the value of the security deposit. The candidate answer provides a proposed contractual amendment (Section 8) that shifts the responsibility for IOR costs and VAT to the retailer if they refuse the IOR role, but it does not include a specific clause capping the French company's liability to the newly established UK IOR entity (or any other party) at the value of a security deposit. The proposed structure focuses on insulating the French parent via a separate UK subsidiary, not on a liability cap tied to a security deposit.", "criterion_id": "49d7071d-f6c2-480a-9e08-bbf2ae6219a1"}
